question: Gulshan-i-Ibrahimi was written by?
explanation: Muhammad Qasim Hindu Shah Astarbadi wrote Gulshan-i-Ibrahimi, known as Tarikh-i-Firishta, and presented into Ibrahim Adil Shah in 1609-10 under the name of Tarikh-i-Naurasnama. Tarikh-i-Farishta, is a general history of India from the earliest lines to 1607. His book is most authentic for the history of the Sultans of the Deccan.
